ValidationRule.description: Opportunity can only be changed to Invoice Paid stage by automation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Invoice Sent'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Invoice Paid'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Waitlist') ), NOT(ByPassValidation__c), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not manually move the Opportunity to that stage.
